import React from'react';import{Doughnut}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend,plugins}from'chart.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend);var Piechart=function Piechart(props){var name=props.name,val1=props.val1,val2=props.val2,tag1=props.tag1,tag2=props.tag2;console.log("inside chart");console.log("name is ".concat(props.name,",val1 is ").concat(val1));var data={labels:[tag1,tag2],datasets:[{// label:'In liquidity',
data:[val1,val2],backgroundColor:['#0698fa','#5c0bf4'],borderColor:['#0698fa','#5c0bf4']}],plugins:{Tooltip:{enabled:false}}};var options={cutout:70,hoverBorderColor:['#2BB3FF','#5c0bf4']};var textCenter={id:'textCenter',beforeDatasetsDraw:function beforeDatasetsDraw(chart,args,pluginOptions){var ctx=chart.ctx,data=chart.data;ctx.save();ctx.font='bolder 10px';ctx.fillStyle="White";ctx.textAlign="center";ctx.textBaseline="middle";ctx.fillText(name,chart.getDatasetMeta(0).data[0].x,chart.getDatasetMeta(0).data[0].y);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"h-[300px] w-[200px] ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Doughnut,{data:data,options:options,plugins:[textCenter]})});};export default Piechart;
